metadata.name: Check The Orange Pepe
metadata.description:
Unveiling the 1st out of 7 limited edition NFTs in my glitch-filled homage collection inspired by Jack Butcher's Opepen project. Immerse yourself in a captivating blend of vibrant orange hues, distorted forms, and calculated glitches. Explore the convergence of art, technology, and happy accidents within this unique artwork.

Please note, this NFT is an independent homage and not officially affiliated with Jack Butcher or Opepen. All rights belong to their respective owners.
